overview: Sweetheart Video continues to explore the dark side of Sapphic love in Lesbian Nior 2: Lesbian Sex Cult. When Elexis Monroe disappears without a trace, private dick Michelle Lay is hired by concerned friend Heather Silk to find her. But a quick interview with Elexis' roommate Tanner Mayes reveals a secret lesbian cult run by the deceptive Heater. Will Michelle find Elexis before Heather does? What dark secrets can be revealed by Sinn Sage? Georgia Jones costars in this twisted tale of darkness and sex magic.
title: Lesbian Noir 2: Lesbian Sex Cult
